file.diff: @@ -1 +1 @@ -<link package="curl.2213" cicount="copy"/> \ No newline at end of file +<link package="curl.SUSE_SLE-11-SP3_Update" cicount="copy"/> \ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,4 +1,10 @@ ------------------------------------------------------------------- +Tue Apr 26 15:07:57 UTC 2016 - meissner@suse.com + +- curl-enforce-tls12.patch: allow enforcing tls 1.0, 1.1 or 1.2. + also report TLSv1.x correctly during debugging. (bsc#977409) + +------------------------------------------------------------------- Sun Mar 13 17:37:28 UTC 2016 - meissner@suse.com
- build a curl enabled openssl1 binary, put in /usr/bin/curl.openssl1

@@ -112,6 +112,7 @@ Patch45: curl-check_ctrl_connection_on_transfer.patch Patch46: 0001-test46-update-cookie-expire-time.patch Patch47: curl-CVE-2016-0755.patch +Patch48: curl-enforce-tls12.patch BuildRoot: %{_tmppath}/%{name}-%{version}-build
%description @@ -231,6 +232,7 @@ %patch45 -p1 %patch46 -p1 %patch47 -p1 +%patch48 -p1
%build autoreconf -fi

@@ -1,4 +1,10 @@ ------------------------------------------------------------------- +Tue Apr 26 15:07:57 UTC 2016 - meissner@suse.com + +- curl-enforce-tls12.patch: allow enforcing tls 1.0, 1.1 or 1.2. + also report TLSv1.x correctly during debugging. (bsc#977409) + +------------------------------------------------------------------- Sun Mar 13 17:37:28 UTC 2016 - meissner@suse.com
- build a curl enabled openssl1 binary, put in /usr/bin/curl.openssl1

@@ -112,6 +112,7 @@ Patch45: curl-check_ctrl_connection_on_transfer.patch Patch46: 0001-test46-update-cookie-expire-time.patch Patch47: curl-CVE-2016-0755.patch +Patch48: curl-enforce-tls12.patch BuildRoot: %{_tmppath}/%{name}-%{version}-build
%description @@ -231,6 +232,7 @@ %patch45 -p1 %patch46 -p1 %patch47 -p1 +%patch48 -p1
%build autoreconf -fi

@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@ +<patchinfo incident="2455"> + <issue id="977409" tracker="bnc">L3: curl-openssl1 does not allow enforcement of tls 1.2</issue> + <category>recommended</category> + <name>curl</name> + <rating>moderate</rating> + <packager>msmeissn</packager> + <description> +This update for curl fixes the following issues: + +- Report the correct TLS version in use when using verbose + mode (-v). (bsc#977409) + +For the TLS 1.2 enabled version to be found in curl-openssl1 (in the SECURITY Module): +- Allow enforcing TLS 1.1 or 1.2 on the curl commandline, + using --tlsv1.1 or --tlsv1.2. (bsc#977409) +</description> + <summary>Recommended update for curl, curl-openssl1</summary> +</patchinfo>

(bsc#977409) +</description> + <summary>Recommended update for curl, curl-openssl1</summary> +</patchinfo>

(bsc#977409) + +For the TLS 1.2 enabled version to be found in curl-openssl1 (in the SECURITY Module): +- Allow enforcing TLS 1.1 or 1.2 on the curl commandline, + using --tlsv1.1 or --tlsv1.2. (bsc#977409) +</description> + <summary>Recommended update for curl, curl-openssl1</summary> +</patchinfo>

@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@ +<patchinfo incident="2455"> + <issue id="977409" tracker="bnc">L3: curl-openssl1 does not allow enforcement of tls 1.2</issue> + <category>recommended</category> + <name>curl</name> + <rating>moderate</rating> + <packager>msmeissn</packager> + <description> +This update for curl fixes the following issues: + +- Report the correct TLS version in use when using verbose + mode (-v). (bsc#977409) + +For the TLS 1.2 enabled version to be found in curl-openssl1 (in the SECURITY Module): +- Allow enforcing TLS 1.1 or 1.2 on the curl commandline, + using --tlsv1.1 or --tlsv1.2. (bsc#977409) +</description> + <summary>Recommended update for curl, curl-openssl1</summary> +</patchinfo>
